channel.title: Question with Game Maker (A bug in it, for me atleast)
channel.description:
Well, I decided a huge project for a team and myself. It was to remake "Metroid (AKA 'Original Metroid'), and it was all going fine 'till now. You see, I started it Wednesday, and worked on it until up to here. I was playing this morning, went to school, came back, got on, loaded it, and I got the Windows "* Got an error will loading. The program will have to be restarted." whenever I play ANY GM games. I have no idea why it happened. I don't want to reinstall it until I find my registration key (I haven't checked if my dad still has the e-mail yet), because I payed for it ( :eek: ).
Thanks to who helped. At all costs, please [i]try[/i] and not get sarcastic with me, really not in the mood =)!
~Lin

@Monkey_wacko wrote:

Lin can you send me the game maker? I’ve been looking for a good Vers. too buy but i can’t find 1…

Gamemaker is gay. It’s for 7 year olds.

stfu bitch, gamemaker is much better then your java games, so watch it.
[/quote]
You forgot to add the /sarcasm part of your post.[/quote]

i think he was being serious…
which means…
people are getting dumber
